footer.join_team: JOIN THE TEAM OF CUSTOMER WHO USE NEO BAZAAR TO SHARE THEIR KNOWLEDGE. EASILY CREATE AND SELL DIGITAL DOWNLOADS USING OUR POWERFUL YET SIMPLE PLATFORM.

category.category_description_1: Looking for inspiration on what you can sell?
category.category_description_2: Discover the best-selling products and creators

sell_to_anyone.name: Sell to anyone
sell_to_anyone.1: BUILD A LOYAL FOLLOWING WITH SIMPLE POSTS, EMAIL NEWSLETTERS, AND AUTOMATED WORKFLOWS. PLUS LET YOUR CUSTOMERS PAY WHAT THEY WANT OR CHOOSE BETWEEN ONE-TIME, RECURRING, OR FIXED-LENGTH PAYMENTS IN YOUR CURRENCY OF CHOICE.

sell_anywhere.name: Sell anywhere
sell_anywhere.1: CREATE AND CUSTOMIZE YOUR STOREFRONT WITH OUR ALL-IN-ONE PLATFORM OR CHOOSE TO USE YOUR PERSONAL SITE INSTEAD. WITH ZAPIER, YOU CAN SEAMLESSLY CONNECT YOUR NEOBAZAAR ACCOUNT TO THOUSANDS OF APPS IN YOUR CURRENT STACK.

description.name: DIGITAL PLATFORM
description.description: THIS IS A SPACE FOR INTERACTION BETWEEN CREATORS AND USERS, PROMOTES THE DISTRIBUTION OF DIGITAL CONTENT AND PROVIDES OPPORTUNITIES FOR MONETIZATION AND DEVELOPMENT IN THE DIGITAL ENVIRONMENT.

form.password_requirements: From 8 to 30 characters. Latin letters, numbers and symbols: !, ?, -, _, . Min 1 digit, 1 letter in lowercase and 1 letter in uppercase

errors.email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address (letters, numbers, ., -, _ only).
errors.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
errors.password_contains_digit: Password must contain at least one digit.
errors.password_contains_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
errors.password_contains_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
errors.password_contains_special_char: Password must contain at least one special character (!?, -, _,.).

login.email_pattern: Please enter a valid email address (letters, numbers, ., -, _ only).
